meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing a carbonyl group attached to two carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the properties of ketenes in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent2: Ketenes are important compounds in the field of organic chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The ketenes at the party were the life of the chemical reaction!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like ketenes in a chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful models to explain the concept of ketenes.

meanings.definition: The simplest member of the ketene class, CH2CO.
meanings.sent1: Students learned about the structure of ketenes in their chemistry class.
meanings.sent2: CH2CO is the basic unit of ketenes in chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The ketenes in the lab were feeling quite simple and small.
meanings.sent4: His ideas spread through the room like ketenes in a reaction vessel.
meanings.sent5: The textbook had a clear diagram illustrating the structure of ketenes.
